title: Aberdeen
summary:
Aberdeen (/ˌæbərˈdiːn/ (listen); Scots: Aiberdeen [ˌeːbərˈdin] (listen); Scottish Gaelic: Obar Dheathain [ˈopəɾ ˈɛ.ɛɲ]; Latin: Aberdonia) is a city in North East Scotland. It is the third most populous city in Scotland, one of Scotland's 32 local government council areas (as Aberdeen City[3]) and the United Kingdom's 39th most populous built-up area, with an official 2018 population estimate of 
200,680 for the city of Aberdeen[1] and 227,560 for the local council area.[4]
